Name: Piraeus
Description: The capital city and the most prominent municipality in this region, known for its port and maritime industry.

Name: Korydallos
Description: A residential municipality located near Piraeus, characterized by its urban environment and residential neighborhoods.

Name: Nikaias-Agios Ioannis Rentis
Description: A municipality located to the north of Piraeus, known for its industrial zones and residential areas.

Name: Keratsini-Drapetsona
Description: A municipality formed by merging Keratsini and Drapetsona, it focuses on port activities and local development.

Name: Perama
Description: A port-related municipality known for its industrial areas and proximity to the commercial port of Piraeus.
